title: The Three-Body Problem
description: The Three-Body Problem is a 2008 hard science fiction novel by Chinese author Cixin Liu, translated by Ken Liu. It is the first book in the Remembrance of Earth's Past trilogy. The story begins during China's Cultural Revolution, where a secret military project sends signals into space, making contact with an alien civilization from the Trisolaris system, which orbits three suns in an unstable configuration. The novel explores themes of first contact, cosmic sociology, and humanity's place in the universe, blending complex scientific concepts with philosophical inquiry. It won the Hugo Award for Best Novel in 2015, marking a significant milestone for Chinese science fiction.

title: 骄阳似我
description: 《骄阳似我》是一部青春爱情剧，讲述了主角从校园到职场的成长历程，以及他们在这一过程中所经历的爱情和挫折。该剧以轻松幽默的方式展现了年轻人的奋斗和梦想，深受观众喜爱。

title: 阿凡达：火与烬
description: 《阿凡达：火与烬》是《阿凡达》系列的第三部作品，继续探索潘多拉星球的神秘世界。影片深入展现了纳美人的文化和生态，同时引入了新的角色和冲突，进一步拓展了潘多拉星球的宇宙观。

title: Stranger Things
description: Stranger Things is a science fiction horror drama series set in the 1980s in the fictional town of Hawkins, Indiana. The story begins with the disappearance of a young boy, Will Byers, and the appearance of a mysterious girl with psychokinetic abilities named Eleven. As friends, family, and local authorities search for Will, they uncover a series of supernatural mysteries, secret government experiments, and a parallel dimension known as the Upside Down. The series pays homage to 1980s pop culture, blending elements of horror, sci-fi, and coming-of-age drama.

title: 三体
description: 《三体》是中国科幻作家刘慈欣创作的科幻小说，是《三体》三部曲的第一部。小说以文化大革命为背景，讲述了人类与三体文明的首次接触以及由此引发的一系列故事。书中探讨了文明的冲突、人类的未来以及宇宙的黑暗森林法则等深刻主题。

title: 三体 II：黑暗森林
description: 《黑暗森林》是《三体》三部曲的第二部，继续讲述了人类与三体文明之间的博弈。书中引入了黑暗森林法则，描绘了人类在宇宙中的孤独与危机，以及人类为了生存而采取的种种策略。

title: 三体 III：死神永生
description: 《死神永生》是《三体》三部曲的终章，探讨了宇宙文明的终极命运和人类的未来。书中通过宏大的叙事和深刻的哲学思考，展现了宇宙的残酷与美丽，以及人类在其中的渺小与伟大。

title: 一人之下
description: 这个世界是存在异人的。 张楚岚就是一个隐藏在普通人中的异人。在生命的前19年中，他一直小心隐藏着自己和别人的不同。直到有一天，神秘少女冯宝宝找上了他。从此他被活尸追，被怪人砍，被卷入了前所未见的麻烦之中……

title: Stranger Things Season 3
description: Set in the summer of 1985 in Hawkins, Indiana, the third season of Stranger Things explores the characters navigating adolescence, new relationships, and summer jobs at the Starcourt Mall. The mood shifts when Dustin intercepts a Russian radio transmission, hinting at a secret Soviet operation beneath the town. Meanwhile, Will senses the return of the Mind Flayer, which now possesses townspeople to build a fleshy monster. Themes of friendship, change, and Cold War paranoia blend with classic 80s nostalgia, leading to a climactic battle at the mall and emotional sacrifices.

title: 3 Body Problem
directorOrAuthor: David Benioff, D.B. Weiss, Alexander Woo
description: 3 Body Problem is a 2024 science fiction television series adaptation of Cixin Liu's novel, created by David Benioff, D.B. Weiss, and Alexander Woo for Netflix. The series interweaves timelines, starting with a fateful decision during China's Cultural Revolution in the 1960s that reverberates to the present day. A group of scientists and a detective uncover an existential threat from an alien civilization, confronting a mysterious series of suicides and a virtual reality game. The show explores themes of scientific discovery, human morality, and planetary survival, adapting the complex narrative for a global audience with a multinational cast and high-production values.

title: 异物志
description: 石坚的女友离奇溺亡在没有水的房间里，于是他开了一家名为“万能小哥”的公司，专接神秘异事，以此寻找女友死亡的真相。石坚偶然捡到一把可以到达任意地方的神奇钥匙，像这样的物件还有很多，例如可以变幻外形的雪花膏、操纵物体的扳指、控制水的吊坠等。石坚意识到女友的死与这些奇幻的物件有关，随着对事件的深入，关于物件的真实起源及其背后的阴谋浮出水面……
